posts.post_content:
4 cards available.

T213 Cobb Bat off shoulder SGC A- $915 paper loss on back there is a small crack/scratch on bottom of holder as pictured. It's not rough like a crack but it goes all the way through unlike a scratch.  Not sure what to call it

T206 Batch Carolina Brights SGC 1- $835 bottom left corner of card is dinged up missing a few letters in his name.

T206 Mathewson SGC 1- SOLD

T206 Young Portrait Sovereign back SGC 1- SOLD amazing front presents very nice just has the paper loss on top right of back of card.

All prices will include tracked bubble mailer shipping. Prices are net to me via paypal. Friends please if goods add 3%. Sold comment trumps on going negotiations. Also as a heads up they are posted elsewhere as well.  Thanks so much and hope everyone is safe and healthy.
I'll take the Sovereign Young. Thank you.
